Detailed Description

An example for legal vertex format.

Use XFCGL_TLVERTEX as vertex format flags. XFCGL_TLVERTEX is defined as (XFCGLVF_XYZ | XFCGLVF_RHW | XFCGLVF_DIFFUSECOLOR | XFCGLVF_TEXTURE1)

See also:
XFCGL_TLVERTEX
